creditline: Gift of Yang and Helen H. Wang
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: orchid plant with very long, thin turquoise-colored leaves and pale green flowers at center; two lines of text--one at left edge, one at right edge; five red seals, including very large red seal at top center
dimension:
49 x 25 in. (124.46 x 63.5 cm) (image)
72 1/2 x 33 1/4 in. (184.15 x 84.46 cm) (overall, without roller)
title: Fragrance of the Orchids
